resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
    <entry>merli/3507</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3507</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3507</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Aula Virtual</string>
            <string language="en">Virtual classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virtuelles Klassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Salle de classe virtuelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sala de aula virtual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aula virtuale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικονική τάξη</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pàgina amb informació, activitats i propostes sobre continguts que es treballen en una aula de música, distribuïdes en sis apartats: Flauta de bec, Cant coral, Conjunt Instrumental, Harmonia bàsica, Llenguatge musical i Teoria dels Instruments. També té un enllaç a la revista electrònica "Mira, Mira".</string>
            <string language="en">Webpage with information, activities and proposals for the music classroom, in six sections: Recorder, Singing, Ensemble, Basic Harmony, Music Notation, and Theory of Instruments. There is also a link to the e-magazine "Mira, Mira".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
            <string language="es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tocar (música)</string>
            <string language="en">playing (music)</string>
            <string language="es">tocar (música)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música vocal</string>
            <string language="en">vocal music</string>
            <string language="es">música vocal</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webseite mit Informationen, Aktivitäten und 
Anträgen für das Musikklassenzimmer, in sechs Kapiteln: 
Schreiber, Singen, Ensemble, grundlegende Harmonie, 
Musik-Darstellung und Theorie der Instrumente. Es gibt auch ein 
Link zur Ezeitschrift "Mira, Mira".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Page Web avec l'information, des activités et 
des propositions pour la salle de classe de musique, dans six sections
: Enregistreur, chant, ensemble, harmonie de base, notation de 
musique, et théorie d'instruments. Il y a également un lien au
l'e-magasin "Mira, Mira".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web page com informação, atividades e propostas
para a sala de aula da música, em seis seções: Registrador, 
cantar, ensemble, harmonia básica, notação da música, e teoria dos
instrumentos. Há também uma ligação ao e-compartimento 
"Mira, Mira".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web page con le informazioni, le attività e le 
proposte di aula di musica, in sei sezioni: Registratore, 
cantare, insieme, armonia di base, notazione di musica e teoria di 
strumenti. Ci è egualmente un collegamento allo e-scomparto 
"Mira, Mira".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Webpage με τις πληροφορίες, τις δραστηριότητες και 
τις προτάσεις για την τάξη μουσικής, σε έξι τμήματα: 
Όργανο καταγραφής, τραγούδι, σύνολο, βασική αρμονία, 
σημείωση μουσικής, και θεωρία των οργάνων. Υπάρχει επίσης 
μια σύνδεση με το ε-περιοδικό "mira, mira".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielen (Musik)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vocal Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu (musique)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique vocale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogar (música)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música vocal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco (musica)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica vocale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παιχνίδι (μουσική)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φωνητική μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
